cast.name: 玛雅·摩根斯特恩 Maia Morgenstern

introduction: Masha is a mercenary paid by the Gorda Mafia to obtain a stick with information that could lead to the Mafia's arrest. In her endeavor, she meets Nick, a student from Central High School, a victim of bullying at school. He aims to change the mindset of his classmates, even though he is a shy child. Despite this, Nick proves to be the bravest among his peers and joins Masha's side. Will these two be able to achieve their goals by combining good with evil?
